meanings.definition: Relating to the highest heaven in ancient belief, where the pure element of fire was thought to exist.
meanings.sent1: The empyrean sky was ablaze with the setting sun's fiery hues.
meanings.sent2: The painter captured the empyrean beauty of the sky in his masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The empyrean realm seemed to be on fire, but it was just a stunning sunset.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the empyrean halls of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent5: The empyrean view from the mountaintop took his breath away.

meanings.definition: The highest heaven, believed by the ancients to be a realm of pure fire.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of heroes ascending to the empyrean after their noble deeds.
meanings.sent2: The ancients believed the empyrean was the dwelling place of gods.
meanings.sent3: The empyrean was so hot that even the gods had to wear sunscreen.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like stars in the empyrean night sky.
meanings.sent5: The empyrean above seemed to beckon to those seeking eternal peace.
